thread.title: Patriots Fan Mark Wahlberg Arrives For Super Bowl 2017
thread.title_full: Patriots Fan Mark Wahlberg Arrives For Super Bowl 2017

author: Just Jared
title: Patriots Fan Mark Wahlberg Arrives For Super Bowl 2017
text:
Tweet Patriots Fan Mark Wahlberg Arrives For Super Bowl 2017 
Mark Wahlberg is such a big Patriots fan that he gets to go onto the field ahead of the 2017 Super Bowl ! 
The 45-year-old actor was spotted hanging out with players before the big game between the Atlanta Falcons and the New England Patriots at NRG Stadium on Sunday (February 5) in Houston, Texas. 
PHOTOS: Check out the latest pics of Mark Wahlberg 
Mark is from Boston and good friends with Patriots quarterback Tom Brady . 
“Big day with my little guys. #PatsNation,” Mark captioned a cute Twitter photo with sons Michael , 10, and Brendan , 8. 
Meanwhile, Usher and former pro baseball player Alex Rodriguez were also seen on the field that afternoon. Big day with my little guys. #PatsNation pic.twitter.com/eb5bel9wL2 
— Mark Wahlberg (@mark_wahlberg) February 5, 2017 
10+ pictures inside of Mark Wahlberg , Usher , and more stars attending Super Bowl 51… Just Jared on Facebook
